lines.text: in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: if length of word is greater than 10
print the first character of word , length of word - 2 and the last character of word to the standard output
lines.code: cout << word [ 0 ] << word . size ( ) - 2 << word [ word . size ( ) - 1 ] << endl ;
